mapper.insert: INSERT INTO medias (id, file_md5, file_name, file_path, file_size, file_extension, mime_type, url, thumbnail_url, description, created_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{fileMd5}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, #{fileExtension}, #{mimeType}, #{url}, #{thumbnailUrl}, #{description}, #{createdAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE medias SET file_md5 = #{fileMd5}, file_name = #{fileName}, file_path = #{filePath}, file_size = #{fileSize}, file_extension = #{fileExtension}, mime_type = #{mimeType}, url = #{url}, thumbnail_url = #{thumbnailUrl}, description = #{description}, updated_at = UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW(3)) * 1000 WHERE id = #{id}
